title: Where Has Grandpa Murray Gone?
description: "Where Has Grandpa Murray Gone?" is a short poetic story that follows the main life events shared between a young man and his grandfather - Murray. It is read from the grandson's point of view and details their loving relationship before, during and after his grandfather's dementia, looking also at how he and his family afterwards eventually learned to cope with their loss. The author lost his own grandfather to vascular dementia - making this poetic piece very personal for him also. "Where Has Grandpa Murray Gone?" is sincerely written to be truly heartfelt and empathetic towards those who themselves share in the same situations which are detailed in this book.
author: Andrew John Bell
